about_the_game:
Unlock three exciting new playable characters with this DLC package:

Character 1

Ai Misayaki: Transformed into a cybernetic being after a life-threatening accident, Ai relentlessly hunts down June, seeking revenge for her ruined life. Her rampage continues after being pulled into the real world.

Character 2

Eve Summerflame: A fiery witch born under tragic circumstances, Eve commands fire and spirits, using her powers in fierce combat. She’s pulled from her manga world into an unexpected new adventure.

Character 3

Yume Nakamura: A girl with extraordinary psychic abilities, able to manipulate particles and create deadly weapons. Her powers were the result of a dangerous experiment by her parents.

Expand your roster and enhance your gameplay with these powerful new characters!

  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 (3.3 GHz) OR AMD Ryzen 5 2600 (3.4 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti OR AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p / 60fps / Low Quality Settings
